oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Video - Demolition of Bojo's Antique Mall
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: demolition; buildings; commercial properties; Summer Avenue; 2010s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Bojo's Antique Mall (formerly Fortner Fine Furniture) at the corner of Summer and National is demolished in this 10-second video captured by a cell phone.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Goforth, Mike
